Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. programme.title: Guess with Jess

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: After all their adventures, Branch no longer finds Cloud Guy as annoying as he once did. But to Cloud Guy, this is an unacceptable betrayal of their adversarial relationship. Dejected, he sets out to find a new rival to annoy./Biggie is hosting Funsgiving this year, and is therefore charged with preparing all of the best dishes for his friends. But in his quest to make things perfect, he goes a little too far…

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: The kids have a race to decide who gets to try some extremely rare berries. / When Scallop finds a beautiful and mysterious sea sculpture, she enlists the help of her friends to search the sea for the artist behind the masterpiece.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Pixie struggles to recreate an old tradition perfectly, the kids realize they can make their own traditions./ A story told by Chef J inspires Juniper to go in search of snow.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Tag and Scooch play Scooch’s favorite board game outside, using the whole town of Pawston as the board. \Tag thinks it’s time for an update to the Pawston City Anthem, which inspires a city-wide music competition where competitors will create and perform new Pawston anthems.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag is left in charge of the Pawston Pawtomotive for the day, Frank and Beans open up a rival garage and take all the business. Tag helps train him (and his tail), and they even track down Master Wag who gives Scooch a good luck charm. But when Scooch loses the good luck charm before his tail-kwondo test, he needs to find a way to believe in himself.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Mr. Tanaka adopts an unruly dog at Sam’s behest, the Zenkos have the job of training the mischievous mutt and turning him into man’s best friend material. / When Ellie's friend Maria is late submitting her painting to the art show, it’s up to the Zenkos to get inside the community center after hours, avoiding overzealous junior security Rodney, and get Maria’s painting on display before the show starts.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: After Lula loses her loose tooth in the park, Team Zenko must find the missing molar and get it under Lula’s pillow in time for the Tooth Fairy’s visit. / Gabriel and Luis show off their new drone but it crash lands on the roof top. Team Zenko's mission is to try and get it back, but Yolanda won't give up her new hi-tech friend that easily.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Magnus and Axel unveil their new "mechano-dragon." It's impressive at first, but the Riders set out to prove it's no better than a bucket of bolts.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: In need of some rest and relaxation, the Riders head out on vacation. But their supposedly perfect island getaway isn't quite what they hoped for.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Klaus is injured and Veruca’s mage powers are not working, stifled by her time in prison. They encounter a dangerous village and Veruca reconnects with her abilities in time to save Klaus, but the two are soon captured by Po and Blade, who are unaware of Veruca’s rekindled powers.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy
programme.desc: On their first day at Palomino Bluffs, the girls are determined to make a good impression. Cue the beachfront race — and a daring rescue!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy
programme.desc: The PALs run into their old rivals the BUDs on the first day of classes, prompting Lucky to run for class rep. Elsewhere, Abigail helps solve a mystery.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: When there is an imposter in Troll Village, Branch and Poppy embark on a man-hunt as to try to keep the Trolls from realizing that anything is off/Poppy discovers that Archer Pastry belongs to a group of evil creatures called the Party Crashers

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Chef J tells a tale about unicorns sailing in ships on clouds in search of Unicorn Land.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag and Scooch learn that Sandra Paws' sleigh broke down on a mountain, they have to go on an adventure to fix the sleigh and save Sniffs-mas! Meanwhile, Beans tries to get a grumpy Frank to feel the Sniffs-mas spirit.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Donna is dog sitting but unable to sleep due to barking, TZG secretly stops a skunk from sneaking into her yard at night and riling the pooch. / When an inexperienced Rona takes over as chairman of the Founder’s Day Celebration, TZG secretly helps ensure the traditional festivities run smoothly.

programme.title: BRO&MARBLE in Dubai
programme.desc: Top celebrities come together to play a real-life “Blue Marble” game in Dubai with unexpected challenges! Who will survive in crisis and seize both friendship and money as the ultimate winning bro?

programme.title: Fresh off the Sea 2
programme.desc: <Fresh off the Sea> returns with Season 2! Lim Ji-yeon and Lee Jae-wook join the crew to hit Korea's coast and explore local delicacies unique to the area.

programme.title: World Dice Tour 3
programme.desc: A single dice roll sends our cast members on a wild ride around the globe. Prepare for jaw-dropping twists on the revamped game board and an epic scale that transforms every destination into a theme park!

programme.title: Second Shot at Love
programme.desc: A self-proclaimed rational drinker who got diagnosed with alcohol dependency reunites with her alcohol-hating first love and takes on a sobriety challenge in this romance.

programme.title: Hashtag Travelog
programme.desc: CIX goes on ad-hoc trip to Hong Kong and Macao. As they arrive, they realize this is a “hashtag travelog”! Danny and Jordan also explore the cities of Guangzhou and Jiangmen by searching for the hashtags.

programme.title: The Backpacker Chef 2
programme.desc: <The Backpacker Chef> is back! With more clients, more demanding environment and an upgraded backpack, how will Chef Paik take on challenges this time?

programme.desc: Adapted from the webtoon of the same title, an ordinary taxi driver who becomes entangled with a customer that turns out to be a serial killer.

programme.title: Walking Through The Village

programme.desc: “VS,” which stands for “Vocal” and “Showdown,” is a survival show where participants showcase their singing abilities and compete against each other through karaoke to win a grand prize of 100 million won.

programme.desc: The <Street Woman Fighter> series make a triumphant return on a global stage! 6 dance crews from different countries set to compete in an upgraded match to win the title of International Champion!

programme.title: Show Dogs
programme.desc: Max, a macho, solitary Rottweiler police dog is ordered to go undercover as a primped show dog in a prestigious Dog Show, along with his human partner, to avert a disaster from happening.

programme.title: Remember
programme.desc: The story of Pil-Joo, an Alzheimer's patient in his 80s, who lost all his family during the Japanese colonial era, and devotes his lifelong revenge before his memories disappear, and a young man in his 20s who helps him.

programme.title: Battle Creek Brawl
programme.desc: A young Asian-American martial artist is forced to participate in a brutal formal street-fighting competition.

programme.title: The Row
programme.desc: A college freshman discovers a dark secret about the sorority house she's pledging for after a series of murders terrorize the campus.

programme.title: Polaroid
programme.desc: A teenage girl's discovery of a vintage Polaroid camera becomes a nightmare when she finds out that whoever takes their photo with it meet a tragic death soon afterward

programme.title: Andron
programme.desc: A group of people are plunged into a dark, claustrophobic maze, where they must fight to survive, as the outside world watches.

programme.title: The Cursed: Dead Man's Prey
programme.desc: A mysterious serial murder cases take place by jaechaui (dead bodies which have risen from the dead and able to talk). These bodies are manipulated by someone.

programme.title: Black Mask
programme.desc: A survivor of a super-soldier project must fight his former comrades as a masked hero

programme.title: Made On The Rooftop
programme.desc: High tension summer romance of cool and hip best of friends, HaNeul and Bong-sik, their relationship struggles and personal secrets .

programme.title: Wind River
programme.desc: A veteran hunter helps an FBI agent investigate the murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation.

programme.title: Angel Has Fallen
programme.desc: Secret Service agent Mike Banning is framed for the attempted assassination of the President and forced to run for his life as he tries to uncover the real threat while evading the FBI and his own agency

programme.title: Sinkhole
programme.desc: A man and his family has just recently moved into a house when a sinkhole suddenly engulfs the whole apartment. As rain begins to fill the sinkhole with water, the survivors must find a solution before time runs out.

programme.title: The Changeover
programme.desc: Based on the Carnegie Medal-winning novel by Margeret Mahy, this film follows sixteen-year-old New Zealander Laura, who lives in a low-rent suburb with her mother and four-year-old brother, Jacko. When an ancient spirit attacks Jacko and slowly draws the life out of him, Laura discovers her true identity and the supernatural ability within her, and must harness it to save her brother’s life.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Meet the extraordinary miniature animals, who use their small size to survive against all odds in the world’s most deadly environments.

programme.title: America In Color S3
programme.desc: Take a full-colour look at the charms and challenges of small town life during the first half of the 20th century. The myth of these quaint, harmonious communities lives on, but by the 1960s many Americans had left to escape poverty and prejudice.

programme.title: The Codebreaker Who Hacked Hitler
programme.desc: Gordon Welchman was a British codebreaker who played a crucial role in undermining Nazi communications in WWII. Discover how Welchman’s top-secret work has impacted modern surveillance and codebreaking.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, the first animals had eyes that were unable to distinguish color -- yet as that changed, ‘seeing in color’ gave animals many advantages, whether to find food, attract a mate or warn off an enemy.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals some of the natural world’s most cunning tricksters and masters of disguise. Discover how some animals use color to hide and disappear into the background, or to trick and deceive.

programme.title: Bornean Elephants
programme.desc: The documentary takes the perspective of Bornean elephants in Sabah as they traverse through the landscape and show how these gentle giants can coexist with humans amidst different challenges faced.

programme.title: Destination Myanmar
programme.desc: Destination Myanmar will take the audience to some of Myanmar's most beautiful and stunning Asian Heritage wetlands with fishermen paddling one-legged along shallow waters and floating gardens.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: Meet some late-life lovers and explore the reasons behind their sexual longevity and their ability to reproduce well into their later years.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: What does it take to maintain alpha status as animals grow older? We investigate the responsibilities and challenges that come with being a senior leader of a pack.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Po, the kids, and the new Panda Guardians must work together to defeat Jindiao once and for all, and get a visit from an unlikely source

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Feeling a little bored with their new hero life, Po and the kids are excited to accept an important invitation to the Forbidden City. Meanwhile, there's a curious disturbance deep in Panda Village...

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the riders go in search of Thunder and must face a gauntlet of dangerous dragons to find their lost friend. Along the way, Tom reveals his big secret to D’Angelo and Alex.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the riders help Thunder, who is seeking revenge against the dragons that chased off his family.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Moving to an exotic new home, an adventurous teenager meets a new group of kids and discovers a dragon in the fissure.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss' reign as CEO is threatened by a charming, multiple-dimpled Outside Consultant Baby (OCB) hired by the Board of Directors. Boss, furious that OCB will ruin Baby Corp with his poorly thought out ideas, tries to distract him while Staci adds the finishing touches to a project that will make OCB unnecessary, The 24 Hour Diaper.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss and family go on Spring Break to visit his grandparents in the big city of Chicago. Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. programme.desc: When Feather is taken by a group of what appear to be zombie dragons, Alex finds her inner hero and rescues her friend.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: On the Volcano Island, Po and the Kids are reunited with Li, Grandma, Ping, Rooster, Wing, and Wong, and work together to find out what's really going on the island. Xiao becomes suspicious of some of her royal workers.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: The Wanderers head to Switzerland to get some chocolate for Whitebeard’s chocolate fondue fountain. In Switzerland they find Odlulu using the Vacuum Key to steal all the country's chocolate so she can win The Colossal Festival of Chocolate.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Bands on the Run Casper and Jimmy form a rock band to compete in the Deedstown Battle of the Bands. Vote for Casper Mantha is angling to win the office of Class Rep, but Kibosh fancies having a fellow ghost in power.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: It's the day of the Toyland Singalong and Clockwork Mouse, an enthusiastic but awful singer, says everything must be perfect! But then her precious key goes missing and Noddy need to quickly investigate: Who stole Clockwork Mouse's key?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa has made his friend Topsy a wonderful present - a noisy set of chimes. But she doesn't want them. Who else in the jungle might like a very noisy set of wind chimes?

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess is concerned that all the water on the farm is frozen and sets about working out when it will come back. He works out that once the sun is out the ice melts and learns all about freezing and melting..

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Mimi is trying to prepare for a visit from Horace and wants the hutch to feel like home for her froggy friend. Jess promises to paint the special seat Mimi has made for Horace green for her, but first he has to work out how to make green from different colours.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Chef J tells a tale about unicorns sailing in ships on clouds in search of Unicorn Land.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: The Rescue Riders plan to team up with the Slinkwings when an angry Grumblegard threatens Huttsgalor. But their old enemies may be up to new tricks.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When George and Harold go back in time to stop the invention of homework, they realize they also eliminated the most important thing in the world: comic books

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade head to the docks to take Klaus and Veruca to England, and Po tries to have fun with her on their last day together. However, Klaus and Veruca break free and hold Po hostage; Blade shockingly gives up the location of the fire whip to save him.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: With the Baby Corp babies exiled from their office and hiding in the Templeton basement, Boss and a trusted team storm Baby Corp to take it back from the villains. Having decided to retire and pass the CEO-ship onto to Staci, he also prepares Tim for her new life as an older brother to just a normal baby brother.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and D’Angelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: After all their adventures, Branch no longer finds Cloud Guy as annoying as he once did. But to Cloud Guy, this is an unacceptable betrayal of their adversarial relationship. Dejected, he sets out to find a new rival to annoy./Biggie is hosting Funsgiving this year, and is therefore charged with preparing all of the best dishes for his friends. But in his quest to make things perfect, he goes a little too far…

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: The kids have a race to decide who gets to try some extremely rare berries. / When Scallop finds a beautiful and mysterious sea sculpture, she enlists the help of her friends to search the sea for the artist behind the masterpiece.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Pixie struggles to recreate an old tradition perfectly, the kids realize they can make their own traditions./ A story told by Chef J inspires Juniper to go in search of snow.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Tag and Scooch play Scooch’s favorite board game outside, using the whole town of Pawston as the board. \Tag thinks it’s time for an update to the Pawston City Anthem, which inspires a city-wide music competition where competitors will create and perform new Pawston anthems.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag is left in charge of the Pawston Pawtomotive for the day, Frank and Beans open up a rival garage and take all the business. But when all the cars around Pawston break down because of Frank's shoddy mechanic work, Tag and Scooch have to go around town to fix all his mistakes. \ Scooch wants to be a Tail-kwondo master like his hero, Master Wag, but he can't break a biscuit with his tail. Tag helps train him (and his tail), and they even track down Master Wag who gives Scooch a good luck charm. But when Scooch loses the good luck charm before his tail-kwondo test, he needs to find a way to believe in himself.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Mr. Tanaka adopts an unruly dog at Sam’s behest, the Zenkos have the job of training the mischievous mutt and turning him into man’s best friend material. / When Ellie's friend Maria is late submitting her painting to the art show, it’s up to the Zenkos to get inside the community center after hours, avoiding overzealous junior security Rodney, and get Maria’s painting on display before the show starts.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: After Lula loses her loose tooth in the park, Team Zenko must find the missing molar and get it under Lula’s pillow in time for the Tooth Fairy’s visit. / Gabriel and Luis show off their new drone but it crash lands on the roof top. Team Zenko's mission is to try and get it back, but Yolanda won't give up her new hi-tech friend that easily.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Magnus and Axel unveil their new "mechano-dragon." It's impressive at first, but the Riders set out to prove it's no better than a bucket of bolts.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: In need of some rest and relaxation, the Riders head out on vacation. But their supposedly perfect island getaway isn't quite what they hoped for.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Klaus is injured and Veruca’s mage powers are not working, stifled by her time in prison. They encounter a dangerous village and Veruca reconnects with her abilities in time to save Klaus, but the two are soon captured by Po and Blade, who are unaware of Veruca’s rekindled powers.

programme.desc: Dr Michael Mosley travels to Australia to enlist in a world-first, two-month sleep treatment program at the Flinders University Sleep Institute.

programme.title: One Cup: A Thousand Stories 1
programme.desc: A lone monk is on his life's mission to recreate the tea cakes of famous sage Lu Yu from the early Tang Dynasty. In an austere nunnery near Wuhan, the nuns experience every stage of tea-making - from picking all the way through to drinking - as an act of prayerful meditation.

programme.title: Michael Palin - Into Iraq 1
programme.desc: Michael continues his journey into the heart of Iraq on his way to Baghdad, and arrives in Kirkuk and the exact spot where the British discovered oil in 1927, when they also ruled the country. The next day, Michael heads towards Tikrit, Saddam Hussein's hometown. Having been stopped at several military checkpoints along the way, but is surprised when he receives a warm welcome from the local commander and coins it 'Checkpoint Cheerful'.

programme.desc: Adjusting to a new way of life, Charlie teams up with an animal liberation operation to rescue a gentle soul unjustly framed for murder at a police awards ceremony.

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part II
programme.desc: After learning about his dying father, Mr Miyagi sets off to see him with Daniel. Upon reaching there, he decides to confront an old rival; meanwhile, Daniel inadvertently makes an enemy of his own.

programme.title: NCIS S22
programme.desc: When a shocking tell-all threatens to ruin Christmas for a decorated Marine, NCIS must unwrap the truth and deliver a holiday miracle -- before the book hits shelves and turns a hero's legacy into a holiday disaster.

programme.title: NCIS S22
programme.desc: After NCIS learns that the owner of Parker's favorite bakery is being blackmailed, they hatch a plan to save her.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S12
programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers S12
programme.desc: Late Night with Seth Meyers is executive produced by the Emmy Award-winning Lorne Michaels and is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and the best in musical talent.

programme.title: Next Level Chef S4
programme.desc: The remaining chefs are tasked with oven roasting, steaming or deep frying.

programme.title: Into The Wild With Bear Grylls And Superstar Rajinikanth (S1)

programme.title: Deadliest Catch (S18)
programme.desc: Captains undergo safety inspections and emergency training. The United States Coast Guard readies for their worst-case scenario: a helicopter crash at sea.

programme.title: Naked And Afraid (S6)
programme.desc: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.

programme.title: Naked And Afraid (S11)

programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.title: The Trigonal: Fight for Justice
programme.desc: An international crime syndicate runs a drug-induced underground fighting tournament, where fighters become guinea pigs for experimental drugs. A retired MMA champion is forced to fight in the tournament. The syndicate thugs brutally assault his wife and kill his best friend, leaving him with no other choice but to fight for justice.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case
programme.desc: Agent Wen is assigned to work undercover for a Southeast Asian military arm dealer to find some munitions and to destroy them. When he finally finds the munitions though, he is attacked by unknown gangsters and has to team up with his partner to recover the munitions so as to prevent a disaster from occurring.

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Embark on the journey with two Thai artistes, Gun and Ticha, as they navigate the bustling city life and discover the serene outskirts of Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: The Comeback
programme.desc: Uncle Hua is a retired agent who owns an antique shop on an old street. When the old street is forcibly demolished by the local Green Dragon Gang one day, Uncle Hua’s hidden identity is accidentally revealed, and he is pursued by a mysterious organization headed by Ah Jie. A fatal duel has just begun!

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Punish Evil
programme.desc: A shipment of newly issued currency is robbed by three armed robbers, prompting Detective Chang to launch an investigation. Following new leads, he successfully takes down one of the robbers. Meanwhile, the other two plot to rob a gold factory amidst the chaos. With meticulous planning, Chang thwarts their scheme and brings them to justice.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Enter the Girl Dragon
programme.desc: A big fan of Bruce Lee, Pooja practises jeet kune do to become a skilled martial artist. She is so obsessed with Bruce Lee’s wisdom and martial arts technique that she loves him more than her boyfriend, Neel. However, when Neel is kidnapped by the mafia, she must fight them to save him.

programme.title: Ppang Car Road 2
programme.desc: From Seoul to Busan, this spectacular eating show takes place at famous bakeries/patisseries to give the dessert lovers the glimpse of tasty goodness of some of the most-coveted desserts of all.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S16)
programme.desc: Five contestants will get a personal Jamie Oliver masterclass as they try to ‘Keep Up with Jamie’. There’s no recipe, only the ability to watch Jamie like a hawk to recreate an Oliver family recipe.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S1)
programme.desc: In honour of Rachael's rock-star friends, she's making hella mexa suiza burgers, or hamburgers and fries cooked with Mexican spices and topped with Swiss and Mexican soft cheese.

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork
programme.desc: We're turning up the heat! Buddy visits two iconic hotspots who are famous for their intensely spicy dishes. First, he heads to Jitlada to see if he can withstand the heat of their Thai Jungle Curry.

programme.title: Deliciously Twisted Classics
programme.desc: Breakfast may be the most important meal of the day, but that doesn't mean we can't reinvent it to create an amazing and more delicious meal. Chefs show off their culinary skills with unexpected twists.

programme.title: Deliciously Twisted Classics
programme.desc: A sandwich can be simple and satisfying, but also a perfect food to twist beyond your wildest imagination into something entirely exciting. Creative chefs push the limits beyond two pieces of bread.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S1)
programme.desc: Rachael teaches us how to make an Israeli-inspired, tahini-based yoghurt sauce with harissa, served over charred chicken and family-style pitta.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S1)
programme.desc: Surf and turf is a great combination, but why not make it even better by serving it with tacos? Rachael shows us how to make the ultimate date-night combo of crab nachos and steak tacos.

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9)
programme.desc: As the six remaining couples go into the final commitment ceremony, the fallout from Olivia sharing an OnlyFans photo of Domenica dominates the night.

programme.title: Spinning Out Of Control
programme.desc: Contest winner Natalie rides her free stationary bike daily, guided by virtual instructor Leah. Soon Natalie becomes infatuated, and initiates a sinister plan to eliminate everyone else from Leah's life.

programme.desc: Amid the custody battle, Rebekah (Coleen Garcia) finds another "Amaya" under the bed. Wanting to start a new life with the other Amaya, Rebekah seeks to set her free. But to do that, she needs to kill the impostor.

programme.title: Status: Single
programme.desc: Rufa’s character is anxious to get married after her boyfriend dumps her and all her girlfriends get married one after the other. At 30, Doris can feel her biological clock ticking.

programme.title: Barumbadings
programme.desc: Three gay gangsters mourn the death of their gay guardian, but end up celebrating his bright and colorful life.

programme.title: Bahay na Pula
programme.desc: Jane (Julia Barretto) and her husband come home to an old ancestral house she inherited from her grandma. As days go by, they realize something evil is living with them in the house.

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: Swipe
programme.desc: When CCTV cameras are installed in Sunrise Apartment, the tenants’ lives begin to unravel through their discreet activities in social media dating sites.

programme.title: Bukas May Umaga
programme.desc: Bukas May Umaga is a story of triumph in struggling for inner freedom and in search for justice of women violently victimized by raped.

programme.title: Donsol
programme.desc: In this film, Donsol is a place of refuge for the butanding but also a holding pen for lost and lonely people who wish for things they are no longer likely to get. Will Daniel and Teresa's newfound bond be strong or will it be blown along with the amihan wind which signals the end of the butanding migratory visit to the small town?

programme.title: Praybeyt Benjamin
programme.desc: Vice plays the role of Benjamin Santos whose family has a long tradition of serving in the military. Conflict ensues when Lolo Benjamin (Eddie Garcia) found out that his grandson is gay.

programme.title: Cry No Fear
programme.desc: Kaycee (Donnalyn Bartolome) and Wendy (Ella Cruz) are always at each other's throat. But when they are left alone in their house amidst a storm, with intruders trying to kill them, they have no choice but to become partners as they try to escape.

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: Seven years after his failed assassination and murder of his family, Ben (Cesar Montano) seeks revenge on Mando (Ricky Davao), master of drug syndicate and white slavery.

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: Kid Manalo, Akin Ang Ulo Mo!
programme.desc: His name is Marco (Gardo Versoza) but people call him Kid. Some years later, he finds himself in Manila as a taxi driver. An attache case containing some five million pesos is left in his cab.

programme.title: The Ship Show (Let Love Sail)
programme.desc: Twelve people are paired into two to compete in a reality show and be the country's next big love team.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang Ang Mahal
programme.desc: Lira (Kylie Verzosa), a prize-winning author, spends a week to finish her final novel. But when she meets Andrei (Zanjoe Marudo), a young documentarist, her plans start to change.

programme.title: I Dream Of Jeannie S4 E02 - Jeannie and The Wild Pipchicks
programme.desc: An astronaut's life is thrown into chaos when he discovers a bottle that contains a beautiful female genie.

programme.title: Bewitched S4 E02 - Toys In Babeland
programme.desc: Samantha’s coronation as Queen of the Witches launches the Stephens family into another year of supernatural antics as they learn to cope with their young daughter’s developing magical powers.

programme.title: CSI S4 E16 - Getting Off
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.title: ALF S2 E05 - Prime Time
programme.desc: Lacking in manners but blessed with a big heart, the brash and outspoken ALF thrills and delights the Tanner family. But Mrs. Tanner worries about the example he sets for the kids.

programme.title: Frasier S6 E02 - Frasier's Curse
programme.desc: In the sixth season of FRASIER, Frasier finally begins to believe that his life is going smoothly, for once. The rug is soon pulled out from under him when the radio station changes its format to a salsa -- leaving him without a job.

programme.title: The Waltons S2 E09 - The Fawn
programme.desc: From the Great Depression to World War II, an American family living in the Blue Ridge Mountains of Virginia struggles to remain together in this heartwarming series, the winner of 13 Emmy Awards, that chronicles the lives of a people poor in material wealth but rich in spirit.

programme.title: ALF S2 E06 - Some Enchanted Evening
programme.desc: Lacking in manners but blessed with a big heart, the brash and outspoken ALF thrills and delights the Tanner family. But Mrs. Tanner worries about the example he sets for the kids.

programme.title: The Food That Built The World (S4)
programme.desc: When an entrepreneur creates the first of its kind shelf-stable peanut butter, it leads to the birth of an iconic sandwich. And as competition heats up to be America's favorite, three brands battle it out.

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S2)
programme.desc: Gross-out humour is as old as human society itself, and so are the toys designed to capitalise on it. From a 1st century Roman Emperor who created the Whoopee cushion, gross equals big bucks for toymakers.

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S2)
programme.desc: The Christmas crazes that helped transform holiday shopping into the frantic, no-holds-barred $1.1 trillion frenzy that it is today.

programme.title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters (S1)
programme.desc: An elite team investigates the mysteries of the Bermuda Triangle aided by a secret map decades in the making. They attempt to unravel the mystery of why 27 US Navy aviators and crew vanished in 1945.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S14)
programme.desc: ‘Ancient Aliens’ follows investigators as they travel to sites where signs of alien life have been discovered. Here, Giorgio Tsoukalos reviews evidence of the existence of extraterrestrial beings.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: The Alaskan wilderness is known for mysterious disappearances, stories of strange creatures, and is a hotspot for UFO sightings. Could Alaska's mysteries be due to a presence that is not of this world?

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S5)
programme.desc: After the team's final experiment of the year, stunning revelations are made all across Skinwalker Ranch.

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid (S1)
programme.desc: Most of the world's holiest places sit in plain sight. But there are some hidden. The revered tomb of Jesus Christ and a prehistoric temple in Malta with mystical properties—why were they concealed?

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: Some people are capable of the seemingly impossible. Whether diving unfathomable depths on one breath, or lifting objects of mind-boggling weight, superhuman feats never cease to amaze.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: The team is ecstatic when new scientific evidence narrows down the location of the gold signature in the Money Pit. Rick realises a lifelong dream when he finally goes underground on Oak Island.

programme.title: Batang Lansangan
programme.desc: Simple as his dreams would be, Ronnie Ricketts is a typical auto mechanic who wants only a peaceful and plain life. But no matter how he tried to live the life he desires, still the rotten elements of the society keep running after him.

programme.title: Aso't Pusa (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Pamboy (Tito Sotto) risked being beaten to a pulp by Osang's father each time he came to defend the girl. He tried to convince to leave, but Osang (Aiza Seguerra) continued to show her love for her father even after he went into jail.

programme.title: Cuadro De Jack
programme.desc: Young comedians Nino, Keempee, Dennis and Smokey starred in this 90's remake of a blockbuster hit. The Filipino version of the cowboy and Indians war made all the more appealing by the laugh-filled sequences featuring the inept, but trying hard bunch of heroes.

programme.title: Palabra De Honor (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia headed this all-star cast in a searing drama about a millionaire patriarch and the power he wielded among the people in an entire town.

programme.title: Psycho Sex Killer
programme.desc: A serial killer is on the loose. And the victims have one thing in common --- they are all in the care of the same psychiatrist.

programme.title: Starlet
programme.desc: The story tells of an obedient daughter who,out of necessity,must do something to save the life of her ailing mother.

programme.title: Rocky N Rolly
programme.desc: The swindling trio of Rolly, Alex and Cleto earn big bucks by using different disguises to fool people. They soon join forces with ex-boxer, Rocky, who quit the sport after syndicate hench men beat him up for refusing him to join the game.

programme.title: Sa Hirap at Ginhawa (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: In the story, a young couple eloped, got married and then must cope with problems like money, living on their own, trying to finish school and raising a baby.

programme.title: Imortal (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Imortal refers to a love so great and so enduring, it defied conventions, tragedy and even the limitations of time.

programme.title: Pieta 2
programme.desc: Rigor (Ace Vergel) dies but in Marta's fear that Noel (Bong Revilla Jr) might turn out like his amoral father, she raises her son with an iron hand.

programme.title: Silakbo
programme.desc: A killer-rapist was on the prowl and all of the victims seemed to have had some sort of connection with the maverick NBI agent, Andy, played by Cesar Montano.

programme.title: Andrew Ford Medina ('Wag Kang Gamol!)
programme.desc: Andrewford Medina (Andrew E) and Jinglebert (Dennis Padilla) do odd jobs for a hotel. Andrew joins a rap competition where Gilbert challenges aspiring rappers and shows his idol who the real king of rap is.

programme.title: Oo Na Sige Na
programme.desc: When their relationship was discovered, Shirley was made to choose between father and boyfriend,Bonggoy.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: DEEPER LOOK
programme.desc: How will Pope Leo XIV, the first US pontiff, lead amid global turmoil? And what might his relationship with Asia look like? Interreligious studies professor Paul Hedges offers his insights.

programme.title: BOSAI
programme.desc: Droughts are increasing and simulations predict that megadroughts could occur in the future. Discover Japan's technology that could solve water scarcity.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: Interval Walking Training, developed in Japan, is attracting global attention. The latest scientific findings show that alternating between fast walking and slow walking promotes health.

programme.title: NHK NEWS 7
programme.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers

programme.title: Journeys in Japan
programme.desc: Dean Newcombe discovers the beauty of Izu Peninsula Unesco Geopark, exploring a crater, coastal lava beds, hot springs, and the deep sea. He also visits a temple and samples local delicacies.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: John Kaizan Neptune is one of the world's leading players of the shakuhachi, a type of Japanese bamboo flute. He talks about making his own instruments and what the shakuhachi can teach us about life.

programme.title: Brown Gold
programme.desc: Using traditional wooden barrels, a soy sauce brewer developed its own original flavor, breathing new life into the world of Japanese soy sauce.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: Mt. Fuji's Faces
programme.desc: We observe "Red Fuji" and "Black Fuji," 2 dramatically different views of Japan's most famous mountain, captured by the artist Hokusai. What did Mount Fuji mean to the people of Edo?

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Dining With the Chef
programme.desc: Cook miso soup with Chef Saito! Follow his instructions to master three styles of miso soup, featuring three different kinds of miso: inaka miso, red miso and white miso.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Document 72 hours
programme.desc: Among the pebbles covering a beach on Niigata Prefecture's Sea of Japan coast are pieces of real jade. For three days, we spoke to the visitors trying their luck in this natural treasure hunt.

programme.desc: Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig offers to put up a picture of Peppa and George on the wall while Mummy Pig is out. He accidentally cracks the wall while doing it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go to the beach, and they do lots of things there including burying Daddy Pig in the sand.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George go for a ride in Grandpa Pig's boat. Danny Dog and Granddad Dog are also out sailing.

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: Froga's strawberries are sick so she's going to miss this year's vegetable picking. When Bubu offers her a walkie-talkie to use, she agrees to let him baby-sit her sick plant.

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: They decide to organise a surprise party on the hill. The organisation gets out of hand when Bubu's invitation cards fly away.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Olly wants to make a simple cake for her Dinosaur Club, but Chef insists on complicating the recipe. Chef and Olly are making dumplings, but first-timer Olly seems better at making them!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favorite jar of salsa open no matter how hard he and his friends try!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When three big emergencies turn out to be too much for one truck alone, Blaze turns himself and his friends into super strong robots to save Axle City.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Blaze and Zeg are in Dinosaur Valley, showing off their amazing robot powers to their dinosaur friends.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When an ancient relic goes missing from Carlos' archeological dig, Tracker and Skye must track down the creature that may have taken it.

programme.title: PAW Patrol

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Mayor Goodway and the twins are late getting back from a snowshoeing, Jake and Everest call the Paw Patrol to search for them.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew build a supersized skateboard for Auntie Crane and River's show. But when it rolls out of control, the pups lead the chase!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: William and Chucks compete for a prize. Chucks gives everyfishy a new nickname.

programme.title: Sharkdog

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: All Sharkdog wants to do is play with his new toy, but when Dad ends up on a wild adventure through town, Sharkdog must give up his playtime.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Sharkdog wants to perform in the talent show with Max, but all Max wants to do is chill. Will Sharkdog perform with one of Max's friends instead?

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 7
programme.desc: The guys are forced to look for love in all the wrong places at a singles' event, and then phone it in making embarrassing calls on strangers' cells. And there's no happily-ever-after for tonight's big loser when his storybook ending becomes a humiliating sob story.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S3 12
programme.desc: Lois and Clark clash with Jordan over his carelessness around using his powers in public. Jonathan struggles with Kyle’s change in behavior. Lex Luthor is released from prison.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 1
programme.desc: Newbies Scott and Chrissy push their way onto Brandon and Lori's turf forcing the couple to burn cash like never before. Then, a set of wrapped pallets heats up the competition, forcing everyone to fight to the finish for what could be nothing morethan hidden garbage. And later, the bidding explodes over a large mystery item. And when the dust settles, two lucky storage warriors unveil the most explosive treasure to date.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 2
programme.desc: Arch-enemies drop their guard to team up against a new threat. Then, it's back to the future when Desert Dan risks all on a tire and a hunch. And later, blades are drawn, fragile alliances crumble, and the buyers let nothing stand in the way of winning big.

programme.title: Run All Night
programme.desc: Lately, it seems Jimmy's only solace can be found at the bottom of a whiskey glass. But when Jimmy's estranged son, Mike (The Killing's Joel Kinnaman), becomes a target, Jimmy must make a choice between the crime family he chose and the real family he abandoned long ago. With Mike on the run, Jimmy's only penance for his past mistakes may be to keep his son from the same fate Jimmy is certain he'll face himself...at the wrong end of a gun. Now, with nowhere safe to turn, Jimmy just has one night to figure out exactly where his loyalties lie and to see if he can finally make things right.

programme.desc: Global Business is the flagship business show of CGTN English Channel, bringing you the latest economic data, business trends and policies.

programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.title: How Deadly - The Truth About Crocodiles in Australia
programme.desc: Welcome to croc country! Nature nerd Ann Jones reacts to crazy and sometimes terrifying animal videos. Can crocodiles climb up and over land? Do they hang out in groups? Are they actually after humans? You will find out.

programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Weeknights at 9pm AEST, Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

programme.title: The First Inventors - Design to Survive
programme.desc: Could you survive in Australia 65,000 years ago? From engineering volcanic landscapes into fish farms to mastering deadly fire, the unique survival inventions that let First Nations people thrive.

programme.title: First Nation Farmers - Station Dreaming
programme.desc: Meet members of a respected Indigenous farming family helping Indigenous youth get their life in order, and discover their own remarkable backstory.

programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account.

programme.title: The World - Episode 90
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Weeknights at 9pm AEST, Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

programme.title: ABC Late News - Episode 115
programme.desc: Follow the latest on today's news, covering what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow in Perth.

programme.title: The Business - Episode 78
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Great Barrier Reef - Great Barrier Reef
programme.desc: Extending over 2000km, the Great Barrier Reef is a complex system. Aaron Pedersen explains that its beauty is just one of many amazing features that makes this natural wonder so important.

programme.title: The First Inventors - Design to Survive
programme.desc: Could you survive in Australia 65,000 years ago? From engineering volcanic landscapes into fish farms to mastering deadly fire, the unique survival inventions that let First Nations people thrive.

programme.title: Beyond Awesome - The Solomon Islands' SeaSistas
programme.desc: We join one of the first women to qualify as a surf instructor in the Solomon Islands as Nagarita and her team use their passion for surfing to empower girls by challenging stereotypes about men and women.

programme.title: Australian Story - Game Of His Life - Ange Postecoglou
programme.desc: At the peak of his career, legendary Australian football manager Ange Postecoglou speaks exclusively to Australian Story about Tottenham Hotspur's stunning Europa League victory and says he's still dreaming big.

programme.title: The World - Episode 90
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Weeknights at 9pm AEST, Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

programme.title: News Breakfast - Episode 116
programme.desc: As each day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday present the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, joined by Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 116
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 116
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Landline - Episode 16
programme.desc: The challenges of green hydrogen technology in WA; and microbes boosting soil health and pasture production in dairy country.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Stirred With Love
programme.desc: Stirred is the word as two top chefs, Federica Andrisani of FICO Hobart and Warren Mendes of Food Trail: South Africa join Adam to make food stirred with love.

programme.title: Four Corners - Episode 19
programme.desc: Four Corners is the home of Australian investigative journalism. These fearless and forensic documentaries expose scandals, trigger inquiries, fire debate and confront taboos.

programme.title: Media Watch - Episode 18
programme.desc: It's the show everybody loves until they're on it. Sitting in the hot seat is new host Linton Besser, a four-time Walkley award-winning investigative reporter and former foreign correspondent.

programme.title: Stuff The British Stole - Great Rubber Heist
programme.desc: Look around you. Rubber is everywhere now, but it wasn't always this way. Marc Fennell takes you deep into the Amazon jungle to unravel an elaborate botanical heist that changed the world.

programme.title: Dream Gardens - Mount Eliza, VIC
programme.desc: Artist Meredith Gaston and her husband Kevin Lindemann want a modern landscape to surround their house in Victoria's Mount Eliza. Instead, they have a neglected 40-year-old garden full of weeds and disease riddled trees.

programme.title: Art Works - Episode 2
programme.desc: We meet Sidney Nolan by way of artist Dean Cross, visit Powerhouse Ultimo's exhibition Eucalyptusdom, as it interrogates colonial narratives, and find out about the playful self-portraits of textile artist Adrienne Doig.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing - Episode 98
programme.desc: Your daily download of everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to key players and experts on the issues driving the news cycle.

programme.title: War Of The Worlds
programme.desc: An alien invasion threatens the future of humanity. The catastrophic nightmare is depicted through the eyes of one American family fighting for survival.

programme.title: Surf's Up
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the annual Penguin World Surfing Championship, and its newest participant, up-and-comer Cody Maverick.

programme.title: Back To School
programme.desc: Millionaire Thornton Melon’s (Rodney Dangerfield) son is a college misfit, so Thornton lends some fatherly support...by enrolling as a fellow freshman! Who cares if he never finished high school? Thornton’s pockets are deep enough to buy his way in! But when he steals his professor’s girlfriend (Sally Kellerman), Thornton goes just a little too far. Now, he’ll have to hit the books, instead of his bank account – or go back to being the world’s wealthiest dropout!

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: A hapless chauffeur must take a comatose Secret Agent's place using his special gadget-laden tuxedo.

programme.title: Surf's Up
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the annual Penguin World Surfing Championship, and its newest participant, up-and-comer Cody Maverick.

programme.title: Elektra
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Elektra unwittingly takes part in her former teacher's test when she protects a former target and his daughter from "The Hand," a sinister crime syndicate of martial arts fighters.

programme.title: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: An adventure-seeking princess on an official visit to Rome slips away from her chaperones to explore the city with a brash newspaperman, then falls in love with him.

programme.title: Surf's Up
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the annual Penguin World Surfing Championship, and its newest participant, up-and-comer Cody Maverick.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: Death, who takes the form of a young man killed in an accident, asks a media mogul to act as his guide to teach him about life on Earth and, in the process, he falls in love with the mogul's daughter.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
programme.desc: A typical married couple a little bored with their relationship come to discover that they are enemy assassins hired to kill each other.

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) move into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: Sinister Doll
programme.desc: A teenager, Pelangi, chances upon a banana tree plantation which is guarded by a mysterious old man. Apart from finding out that a young girl was buried with her favourite doll in this banana plantation decades ago, Pelangi also uncovers a horrifying secret about her death…

programme.title: Lost Memories
programme.desc: As a young mother grapples with her daughter's mysterious disappearance, a series of eerie events unfold. These events could be linked to the vengeful ghosts of a tragic accident that happened 20 years ago...

programme.title: In Cycle
programme.desc: A seemingly happy couple who loves diving come to a deserted island for a diving vacation, which is part of the husband’s plan to murder his wife. His conspiracy however, is intervened by a series of bizarre events on the island. Can the couple eventually escape from the enigmatic ocean?

programme.title: Chapter 1 Mae Nak Reborn
programme.desc: Mae Nak the ghost wife returns to take revenge for a pregnant woman who is sexually assaulted and loses her baby. No one can identify the assailant except Mae Nak, who turns into an evil spirit in order to punish the assailant for his evil deeds.

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: Fate Jealous Greed
programme.desc: The film consists of three short horror stories: a man tries to survive after he received a haunted mail predicting his death; while a man mourns the death of his beloved wife, she becomes a ghost and tries to communicate with him; three brothers clash over the care options of their elderly mother during dinner, leading to a terrifying murder.

programme.title: Wang Fam
programme.desc: Boo is a human marrying an aswang, Malou, to save her life, but he soon turns into an aswang as well to escape the pursue of other aswangs. After having three children, Boo and Malou decide to start a more normal and less monstrous family life in Manila. Can they start anew?

programme.title: Digital Addiction
programme.desc: Wade is addicted to gaming. With no job and no income, he is on the verge of eviction. Alexis, 21, has been a cell phone junkie ever since she got her first phone at nine years old.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers (S2)
programme.desc: A couple go on a cruise to repair their marriage, but their week alone comes to a tragic end when her body falls from an upper deck. Is it an accident, or has something more sinister taken place?

programme.title: Butchers Of The Bayou
programme.desc: The tire track found at the Donna Bennett Johnston crime scene provided police with a long list of potential suspects, everyone in the Baton Rouge area who had purchased an Aquatred tire.

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: After a young woman is found dead in her bathtub, the investigation focuses in on her estranged husband and her boyfriend. An unexpected digital clue has one of them confessing to the murder.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S2)
programme.desc: When a young college student disappears on her evening run, investigators scour her small town searching for her. And when her accused attacker, Cristhian Bahena Rivera takes the stand.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Five women share their harrowing accounts of abduction and imprisonment. They discuss what happens when the news coverage dies down and how they've healed from the trauma they experienced.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S1)
programme.desc: A man with a dark past is brought into the interrogation room after a woman is murdered and a young girl vanishes.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: When an Army Sergeant is gunned down on New Year's Eve, investigators are at a loss on who would harm the beloved family man, until fellow soldiers in his unit confess shocking secrets to solve his murder.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: JaRay Wilson texted her mother just minutes before she vanished. For over a year, the teen's friends, family, and community searched for answers.

programme.title: Paranormal: Caught On Camera (S3)
programme.desc: The spirit of a departed child leaves its handprint on a couple's mirror. A ghost takes control of a willing paranormal investigator's neck. A woman spots what appears to be a mermaid in a local lake.
